Detailed Description

Class CoarsenOperator is an abstract base class for each spatial coarsening operator used in the SAMRAI framework. This class defines the interface between numerical coarsening routines and the rest of the framework. Each concrete coarsening operator subclass must provide four operations:

  • (1) {an implementation of the coarsening operation appropriate for its corresponding patch data type.}
  • (2) {a function that determines whether or not the operator matches an arbitrary request for a coarsening operator.}
  • (3) {a function that returns the stencil width of the operator (i.e., the number of ghost cells needed by the operator).}
  • (4) {a function that returns an integer stating the priority of the operator with respect to other coarsening operators.}

To add a new coarsening operator (either for a new patch data type or for a new time coarsening routine on an existing type), define the operator by inheriting from this abstract base class. The operator subclass must implement the coarsening operation in the coarsen() function. The stencil width and operator priority must be returned from the getStencilWidth() and getOperatorPriority() functions, respectively. Then, the new operator must be added to the operator list for the appropriate transfer geometry object using the BaseGridGeometry::addCarsenOperator() function.

Since spatial coarsening operators usually depend on patch data centering and data type as well as the mesh coordinate system, they are defined in the geometry package.

See also:
hier::TransferOperatorRegistry

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::CoarsenOperator ( const std::string &  name  ) 

Construct the object with a name to allow the hier::TransferOperatorRegistry class to look up the object using a string.

The constructor must be given a name. The object will be registered under this name with the hier::TransferOperatorRegistry class. The name must be unique, as duplicate names are not allowed.

SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::~CoarsenOperator (  )  [virtual]

The virtual destructor for the coarsening operator does nothing interesting.

Member Function Documentation

const std::string& SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::getOperatorName (  )  const [inline]

Return name std::string identifier of the coarsening operation.

virtual int SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::getOperatorPriority (  )  const [pure virtual]

Return the priority of this operator relative to other coarsening operators. The SAMRAI transfer routines guarantee that coarsening using operators with lower priority values will be performed before those with higher priority.

Implemented in SAMRAI::pdat::NodeComplexInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeDoubleInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeFloatInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeIntegerInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeDoubleConstantCoarsen, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOutersideDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideDoubleWeightedAverage, and SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideFloatWeightedAverage.

virtual IntVector SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::getStencilWidth ( const tbox::Dimension &  dim  )  const [pure virtual]

Return the stencil width associated with the coarsening operator. The SAMRAI transfer routines guarantee that the source patch will contain sufficient ghost cell data surrounding the interior to satisfy the stencil width requirements for each coarsening operator. If your implementation doesn't work with the given dimension, return zero.

Implemented in SAMRAI::pdat::NodeComplexInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeDoubleInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeFloatInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeIntegerInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeDoubleConstantCoarsen, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOutersideDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideDoubleWeightedAverage, and SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideFloatWeightedAverage.

virtual void SAMRAI::hier::CoarsenOperator::coarsen ( Patch &  coarse,
const Patch &  fine,
const int  dst_component,
const int  src_component,
const Box &  coarse_box,
const IntVector &  ratio 
) const [pure virtual]

Coarsen the source component on the fine patch to the destination component on the coarse patch. The coarsening operation is performed on the intersection of the destination patch and the coarse box. The fine patch is guaranteed to contain sufficient data for the stencil width of the coarsening operator.

Implemented in SAMRAI::pdat::NodeComplexInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeDoubleInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeFloatInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::NodeIntegerInjection, SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeDoubleConstantCoarsen, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianEdgeFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOuterfaceFloatWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianOutersideDoubleWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideComplexWeightedAverage, SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideDoubleWeightedAverage, and SAMRAI::geom::CartesianSideFloatWeightedAverage.

Get the max stencil width of all coarsen operators.

The max stencil width computed from all registered (constructed) coarsen operators.
